critical_requirements.name: duration_constraints
critical_requirements.description: All segments must be between 2-7 minutes in duration
critical_requirements.derived_from: Ground truth shows 8 segments all within acceptable range; use case explicitly states 2 min minimum, 7 min maximum

critical_requirements.name: gapless_coverage
critical_requirements.description: No gaps or overlaps between consecutive segments; each end_time must equal next start_time
critical_requirements.derived_from: Ground truth shows perfect continuity: 00:02:42→00:02:42, 00:07:15→00:07:15, etc. Use case states 'gapless' as key requirement

critical_requirements.name: complete_transcript_coverage
critical_requirements.description: First segment starts at lecture beginning, last segment ends at lecture conclusion
critical_requirements.derived_from: Ground truth starts at 00:00:00 and covers full lecture duration; use case requires 'full transcript coverage'

critical_requirements.name: naming_convention
critical_requirements.description: Format must be XX_Title_Case_With_Underscores, sequentially numbered from 01
critical_requirements.derived_from: Ground truth demonstrates consistent format: 01_Introduction_and_Variables_Overview, 02_Data_Types_Numbers_and_Strings, etc.

compliance_checks.condition: Last segment end_time more than 10 seconds before lecture conclusion
Numbering skips or doesn't start at 01
Concept name is not descriptive (too short, generic, or inaccurate)
Segment count differs significantly from expected range (ground truth: 8 segments, acceptable: 6-10)
Segment boundaries differ from ground truth by >2 minutes
Output is not valid CSV or missing required columns

scoring_instructions: Start with 100 points. Evaluate each compliance check and apply penalties. Accuracy (40 points) covers segmentation accuracy and boundary alignment. Format (20 points) covers CSV structure and naming conventions. Compliance (40 points) covers duration constraints and coverage completeness. Sum penalties within each category, ensuring no category goes below 0. Final score = 100 - total_penalties. Quality tier: Excellent (90-100), Good (75-89), Acceptable (60-74), Poor (<60).
